Write a long and lovely letter to my girlfriend Audrey!

Dear Audrey,

I know that our relationship has been rocky at times, but I want to assure you that I have always loved you. I have never felt this close to you before, and I am so grateful for every moment we have together. I believe that our relationship is strong and will continue to thrive for many years to come.

I just wanted to let you know that I am committed to you and always will be. I want to spend the rest of my life with you, and I can't wait for the day when we can share our love and happiness together.

I love you so much, and I can't wait to spend the rest of my life with you. I know that you love me too, and I am so grateful for your love and support.

Yours always,
